meanings.definition: The act of making something alkaline.
meanings.sent1: Her alkalinizations of the soil improved the growth of the plants.
meanings.sent2: The alkalinizations of the water were necessary for the experiment to succeed.
meanings.sent3: The alkalinizations of the pool turned it into a giant bubble bath!
meanings.sent4: His alkalinizations of the situation brought peace to the group.
meanings.sent5: The alkalinizations of the solution made it safe for use.

meanings.sent1: The alkalinizations of the substance were gradual but noticeable.
meanings.sent2: During the alkalinizations of the solution, the color changed from red to blue.
meanings.sent3: The alkalinizations of the cake batter made it rise beautifully in the oven.
meanings.sent4: As time passed, the alkalinizations of the lake made it less acidic.
meanings.sent5: The alkalinizations of the soil transformed it into a fertile ground for crops.
